name: Stackable Runes
description: Adds another variation of runes that can stack together. Transmute a rune in the Cube to convert it between the two variants. Based on https://www.nexusmods.com/diablo2resurrected/mods/80 and https://www.nexusmods.com/diablo2resurrected/mods/77.
author: olegbl

config.name: Better Rune Visibility
config.description: Enable to use new rune sprites with rune name and number on the picture. Disable to use classic sprites.

config.name: Convert When Destacking
config.description: Enable to have the split off rune automatically convert to a non-stackable variant when splitting a stack. Warning: this adds 15k+ cube recipes which slows down the game's startup.
